title: Cabinet approves to revise Circular on Grade 1 admissions for 2023
body_lines: The Cabinet of Ministers has approved to revise the Circular on the admission of students to Grade 1 of the

The decision to revise the circular has been after taking into consideration the facts submitted by various parties, including the Principals, Circular Revision Committee, Investigation Division of the Ministry, Bribery and Corruption Investigation Commission, Elections Commission, and Court decisions.
The proposal calls to adhere to the provisions mentioned in the revised Circular of the Ministry for the admission of students to Grade 1 of the schools with effect from the year 2023.
The Cabinet paper to this effect submitted by Education Minister Susil Premajayantha was approved by the Cabinet of Ministers on Monday.
